alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Stephens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Franklin and southern Stephens Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Toccoa, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carnesville, Toccoa, Royston, Canon, Franklin Springs, Martin, Avalon, Victoria Bryant State Park, Eastanolee and Boydville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
